apps.name: iNDS
apps.subtitle: Revival of the Nintendo DS emulator for iOS.
apps.versionDescription: Version 1.10.7 adds better support for Dark Mode on iOS, thus fixing #129 and #148. Additionally, landscape mode support for modern iPhones (after iPhone X) was improved, fixing #153. Additionally, a bug was fixed in which the status bar would appear in-game and not be dismissable.
apps.localizedDescription:
iNDS is a derivation of the previous Nintendo DS emulator apps for iOS: nds4ios and Nitrogen. The iNDS Team release of iNDS is a fork of the original iNDS emulator by William Cobb. The iNDS Team aims to create a version that is driven by support from the community, adding trusted contributors to the team over time so that pull requests and issues do not sit untouched.

Currently, emulation is powered by the DeSmuME threaded ARM interpreter and runs at nearly full speed on the iPhone 5 and above. Due to the need to mmap the entire ROM into memory, older devices with only 256MB of RAM are not supported. These devices include the iPod Touch 4, iPad 1, iPhone 3GS, and anything below those devices.

permissions.usageDescription: Allows iNDS to use images from your Photo Library as game artwork.

apps.name: Unc0ver
apps.subtitle: The most advanced jailbreak tool.
apps.versionDescription:
* Enable iOS 13.5.5~b1 support
* Fix a logic bug in disabling auto updates
* Update bundled Cydia to fix crashes on iOS 13.5 with Hardware Keyboard enabled
apps.localizedDescription:
unc0ver is an advanced jailbreaking tool for iOS devices. Jailbreaking with unc0ver unlocks the true power of your iDevice. Customize the appearance of your device, gain full control over how your device operates, obtain access to hidden features of iOS, and more.

Compatibility:
* unc0ver supports iOS 11.0 through to iOS 13.5 (Excluding 12.3-12.3.2 and 12.4.2-12.4.5) and now iOS 13.5.5 Beta.

Stability:
* Utilizing the latest stable APT and Mobile Substrate, stability is guaranteed.

apps.name: GBA4iOS
apps.subtitle: Game Boy games in your pocket.
apps.localizedDescription:
Classic Gaming, Meet iOS.

While iPhone and iOS have brought a new era of gaming upon us, there will always be room in our hearts for those classic games from decades ago. Unfortunately, there has been no easy way for people to play these games whenever they so desired...that is, until now. GBA4iOS was made for one purpose and one purpose only: to help everyone relive their favorite games from their past. Now, every where you take your iPhone, iPad, or iPod Touch, you can bring and play your classic games with you, giving you practically endless hours of entertainment!

So that's great and all, but what features does GBA4iOS actually have? Far too many to list in one App Store description, but here are some of the biggest:

â€¢ Multiplayer (iPhone 5 or newer, iPad 4 or newer). GBA4iOS allows you to link with other players nearby and play with them, allowing you to unlock or experience certain events in games that are unavailable to just one player! Plus, nothing is cooler than playing games with your friends.

â€¢ Save States. Ever get frustrated when a game requires you to save only at certain points? Well be frustrated no longer, GBA4iOS fully supports Save States, allowing you to save anywhere in the game and resume right from that point later. Even better, you can protect certain save states so you never accidentally overwrite them (and as everyone knows losing game data is one of the worst things in the world).

â€¢ Cheat Codes. Sometimes games are just too hard, and you need a little boost to help defeat it. GBA4iOS allows you to input and use GameShark, Action Replay, Code Breaker, and Game Genie codes as you see fit. Don't worry, we won't judge!

â€¢ Fast Forward (iPhone 4s or newer, iPad 2 or newer, iPod Touch 5th Gen). Don't you wish there was a way to speed up long cutscenes in games, or to reduce the time doing boring tasks in the game? Well, now there is! GBA4iOS allows you to "Fast Forward" through slow parts of the game, allowing you to get back to the fun even quicker.

â€¢ Customizable Controller Skins. Want to change the look of the controller to something more personal? No worries, you can download a multitude of new controller skins from within the app, or download almost countless more from the web! You'll definitely be able to find a controller skin you like.

â€¢ Dropbox Sync. Have multiple devices, or worried something will happen to your games? Dropbox Sync solves both these issues! When enabled, GBA4iOS will sync your game saves, save states, and cheat codes to Dropbox, keeping any and all your devices up to date with your latest changes. Plus, this means your game data is always backed up in the cloud, so if something happens to your device, your data is safe.

â€¢ MFi Controller Support. Sometimes, touchscreen buttons just aren't good enough for the level of precision needed by some games. Luckily, GBA4iOS supports MFi Controllers, allowing you to connect and use physical controllers with your games! Now you can beat that final boss without a sweat.

All this and more ensures that GBA4iOS will give you the best portable gaming experience, hands down. So what are you waiting for, download GBA4iOS now and enjoy reliving your favorite classic games immediately!

apps.name: DolphiniOS
apps.subtitle: GameCube and Wii games now on iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
Fixes a few issues with DolphiniOS not able to update or install. To keep using this app be sure to remain on iOS 13.4.1 and below.

Find the full changelog here: https://oatmealdome.me/blog/dolphinios-ver-2-2-0/
apps.localizedDescription:
DolphiniOS is a port of the popular GameCube and Wii emulator to iOS. Dolphin lets you play your favorite GameCube and Wii games with various enhancements like higher resolutions, save states, and more. You can even play all of Nintendo's classics from past consoles through the Wii's Virtual Console library.

Please note that devices with A8 processors and older are not compatible and this app is only compatible with iOS 13.4.1 and below.

Shoutout to the Psychic Paper exploit for making this app possible on jailed devices.

permissions.usageDescription: DolphiniOS uses your device's accelerometer and gyroscope to emulate the Wii Remote's built-in accelerometer and gyroscope.

apps.name: UTM
apps.subtitle: Any OS, Anywhere.
apps.versionDescription:
Happy WWDC! And the gold v1.0 is here!

Changes

â€¢ Improved contrast of buttons and spinner
â€¢ Added pull-to-refresh on home screen
â€¢ Fix alignment and display issues with activity indicator popup

Known Issues

Please check the full list on Github and help report any bug you find that is not listed.

https://github.com/utmapp/UTM/issues
apps.localizedDescription:
UTM is a full featured virtual machine host for iOS. In short, it allows you to run Windows, Android, and more on your iPhone and iPad. More information at https://getutm.app/

Features:

â€¢ Emulate any Processor
30+ processors supported by qemu including x86_64, ARM64, and RISC-V
â€¢ Run any Operating System
Windows, Linux, and more natively and securely on iOS within an App
â€¢ Fast Emulation
Para-virtualization with SPICE and JIT compilation with TCG
â€¢ High Compatibility
iOS 11+ supported. Works on iPhone and iPad. No jailbreak needed
â€¢ Free and Open Source
UTM and its dependencies are all free and open source
â€¢ Easy to Use
Configure and customize your VM in a native UI
